Page title of the UserGamificationProfile special page.
{{Identical|User Gamification Profile}}
gamification-notloggedin: Message to display when a user is not logged in and wants to view User Gamification Data

gamification-rank-3: Text of the Rank 3 level of gamification badges

gamification-badge-display-singular: Text of the singular badge name
gamification-badge-display-plural: Text of the plural badge name
gamification-name-notpopulated: Text of the name display if not populated
